text:
Fired Teen Mom OG star/classic TV bad girl, Farrah Abraham, recently got butt injections and SHE LOVES THEM, OK?

"#bootysecret ALERT! @flawlessvegas gets you the summer ready booty you have always wanted! Watch live now!" Farrah posted to Instagram. "I've enjoyed this no pain, quick & lasta two years. #summerready #smooth #lifted #natural #dimples #butt #squats #momlife #swimsuit #bikinibody #celebritysecrets #buttinjections #2018."

Related: #buttinjections2018 is gonna be my new Insta hashtag for legit everything.

However, as eagle eyed viewers were quick to point out, Farrah brought her 9-year-old daughter Sophia to her to watch her get stuff squirted into her butt.

Of course, Farrah had to pop off right back!

"This is non-invasive just like blood work or getting shots," she wrote. "@FlawlessLasVegas did an amazing job and our children our curious so more power to Sophia learning about aesthetics & health."



Never one to be outdone by her mom, Sophia shot back, "This was weird. I would do squats my momma." Oh, dang!

There you have it, and are you surprised? I personally would be shocked if Farrah *didn't* bring Sophia to get butt injections, you know? At this point, I'm just thankful she didn't make Sophia get them, you know??

Farrah is currently working on her own things (??) after being fired by MTV. She starred on various iterations of the Teen Mom franchise for nearly a decade.
authors: Laura Beck Is A Los Angeles-Based Tv Writer
Her Work Has Appeared In The New York Times
title: Farrah Abraham Just Defended Letting Her Daughter Watch Her Get Butt Injections, So ?
